alert.note: Alert for Marion; McPherson; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:26AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern McPherson, northwestern Marion and Saline Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 526 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lindsborg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salina, Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Galva, Canton, Marquette, Assaria, Gypsum, Smolan, Ramona, Lehigh, Durham, Tampa, Falun, Lost Springs, Salina Airport, Roxbury, Bridgeport, Pilsen, and Kipp. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 61 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 249 and 255. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
